noun.description: The direction toward the point of the horizon midway between north and east.
The northeastern part of a country, region, or town.
examples: people from the predominantly Russian towns in the northeast

adjective.description: Lying toward, near, or facing the northeast.
Of or denoting the northeastern part of a specified country, region, or town.

proper noun.description: A region of the US, usually thought to include the six New England states, New Jersey, and the eastern portions of New York State and Pennsylvania.
